<<<<<<< HEAD
The use of passions written in French by J.F. Senault ; and put into English by Henry, Earl of Monmouth. De l'usage des passions. English Senault, Jean-François, 1601-1672. Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.
[49], 510 [i.e. 512] p. : ill.
Printed by W.G. for John Sims ..., London : 1671.
Added engraved t.p. Translation of: De l'usage des passions. Many pages are tightly bound in the filmed copy. Pages 1-219 photographed from Newberry Library copy and inserted at the end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Marginal notes.
=======

[49], 510 [i.e. 512] p. : ill.
Printed by W.G. for John Sims ..., London : 1671.
Added engraved t.p. Translation of: De l'usage des passions. Many pages are tightly bound in the filmed copy. Pages 1-219 photographed from Newberry Library copy and inserted at the end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Marginal notes.
